img_summary: The image shows a detailed 3D model of a horn-shaped artifact with a decorative base. The base features a sculpted figure of a mythical creature, possibly a lion or a similar animal, with an open mouth and a fierce expression. The horn itself is white with a textured band near the top. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing attention on the artifact.
